parameters.name: HostGroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group to which you want to add hosts.

>You can call the [ListHostGroups](~~201307~~) operation to query the asset group ID.

parameters.name: HostIds
parameters.description:
The IDs of the hosts that you want to add to the asset group. Specify a JSON string. You can specify up to 100 host IDs.

> You can call the [ListHosts](~~200665~~) operation to query the host IDs.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the bastion host whose asset group you want to add hosts to.

> You can call the [DescribeInstances](~~153281~~) operation to query the bastion host ID.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the bastion host whose asset group you want to add hosts to.

> For more information about the mapping between region IDs and region names, see [Regions and zones](~~40654~~).
